name: Ball Valve - Full Passage - Aluminum Lever - Female/Female
description: Ball valve with full passage and aluminum lever. Temperature limits: -20° to +185°C - Pressure limits: PN25 to PN64. ISO228/1 thread. Suitable for all types of domestic and commercial plumbing systems, industrial and agricultural applications, heating and sanitary systems, compressed air, various oils, petroleum products. Female/Female stop lever.

name: Ball Valve - Full Passage - Aluminum Lever - Male/Female
description: Ball valve with full passage and aluminum lever. Temperature limits: -20° to +185°C - Pressure limits: PN25 to PN64. ISO228/1 thread. Suitable for all types of domestic and commercial plumbing systems, industrial and agricultural applications, heating and sanitary systems, compressed air, various oils, petroleum products. Male/Female stop lever.

name: Ball Valve - Full Passage - Butterfly Handle - Female/Female
description: Ball valve with full passage and aluminum butterfly handle. Temperature limits: -20° to +185°C - Pressure limits: PN25 to PN64. ISO228/1 thread. Suitable for all types of domestic and commercial plumbing systems, industrial and agricultural applications, heating and sanitary systems, compressed air, various oils, petroleum products. Butterfly handle Female/Female.

name: 3-Way Ball Valve - L-Port - 1/2 Inch
description: 3-way ball valve with L-port configuration. Chrome plated brass body. Ideal for mixing or diverting flow in heating systems. Temperature range: -10° to +110°C. Maximum pressure: PN25.

name: 3-Way Ball Valve - T-Port - 3/4 Inch
description: 3-way ball valve with T-port configuration. Chrome plated brass body. Perfect for flow distribution in hydronic systems. Temperature range: -10° to +110°C. Maximum pressure: PN25.

name: Circulation Pump - Energy Class A - 60W
description: High-efficiency circulation pump for heating systems. Energy class A. Power: 60W. Flow rate: 3.5 m³/h. Head: 6m. Includes insulation shell and energy-saving timer.

name: Circulation Pump - Energy Class A - 80W
description: Premium circulation pump for large heating systems. Energy class A. Power: 80W. Flow rate: 4.8 m³/h. Head: 8m. Smart control with auto-adapt function.

name: Brass Radiator Valve - Angled - 1/2 Inch
description: Angled radiator valve with chrome-plated brass body. Pre-settable with lockshield. Suitable for single and dual pipe systems. Connection: 1/2 inch.

name: Brass Radiator Valve - Straight - 3/4 Inch
description: Straight radiator valve with chrome-plated brass body. Pre-settable with lockshield. Suitable for single and dual pipe systems. Connection: 3/4 inch.

name: Expansion Tank - Heating - 18 Liters
description: Expansion tank for heating systems. Capacity: 18 liters. Pre-charged to 1.5 bar. Maximum temperature: 120°C. Red membrane for heating applications. Includes wall bracket.
